name: Perilous Path
description:
Can you remember well?
If you want to check your memory capacity, let's play this Perilous Path!!! This memory matching game will stimulate your brain in entertaining way. It is totally addictive and fun to take those cards and increase your memory power.
This Memory matching game is promisingly rated among favorite card games, with its’ classic gameplay and perfect combination of innovation. This challenge brain challenge game will put your photographic memory to the test. You need to connect matching tiles without being entangled in the hidden obstacles, which only appear for a few seconds. Watch out, the game gets over if you are not focused totally!
Features:
* High-quality picture visual effects to satisfy your appetite
* Suitable free Memory Challenge Game for kids and adults
* Score increases/decreases regarding your skill
* The easy- to- use controls, free memory training game
* Addictive matching gameplay and stunning soundtrack
* Fully customizable game menu
* Awesome user experience and GUI
Ready to challenge your memory?
Perilous Path is very easy to play for everyone to enjoy. Such Memory game will quickly train your memory, improve your concentration. This card remember matching game is really an useful exercise for your brain, even sharpens your mind and boosts your brainpower.
With an increasing degree of difficulty and raise of obstacles, this game is a real challenge to your memory and brain!
Test now your ability to memorize and observation with Perilous Path, FREE!
